channel.title: Virtualiser hyperv virtualbox unsupported by developers
channel.description:
Been using whonix fine for months then all of a sudden it starts getting really slow and I get the message in the subject line. Anyone know how I can fix this?
thanks for the help, Gavin

item.title: Virtualiser hyperv virtualbox unsupported by developers
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Thanks. Just committed an untested (because I have no such test system) fix to git.

  • https://github.com/Whonix/whonixcheck/commit/bbbb1f68494a0dd08cc311e046524deb95339760
  • https://github.com/Whonix/whonixcheck/blob/master/usr/lib/whonixcheck/check_virtualizer

If you like to test, take https://github.com/Whonix/whonixcheck/blob/master/usr/lib/whonixcheck/check_virtualizer (perhaps click “raw” https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Whonix/whonixcheck/master/usr/lib/whonixcheck/check_virtualizer) and replace contents of /usr/lib/whonixcheck/check_virtualizer.

If you like to check the difference, use meld or so, it’s a pretty simple change.

Read full topic

item.title: Virtualiser hyperv virtualbox unsupported by developers
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
We should fix that. Can you re-enable that please and then run.

Because in future otherwise many users will likely be afflicted and report this.

Read full topic
item.source: Virtualiser hyperv virtualbox unsupported by developers

item.title: Virtualiser hyperv virtualbox unsupported by developers
item.dc:creator: Gavinj123
item.description:
Nevermind, have fixed it now… it started happening right after I updated Windows, I just went to ‘programs & features’ unticked ‘Hyper V’ and everything is working smoothly again.

Yes I was running virtualbox with Whonix 9.4 i beleive

thanks!

Read full topic

Very strange. What Whonix version are you using?

What is the output of

?

Did you upgrade to Debian testing?

What virtualizer are you using? VirtualBox?
